S.FORM: kamu nu hulam: tinaku a kamu tizeng tizeng amanakasa i panan. . patizeng patizeng tu malebekay a paza' ci Tuku. Tuku . pitizeng makaazih tu tayniay a tademaw pitizeng mimetmet tu lima! mapatizeng mapatizeng tu ku luma' nu misu Panay. Panay . mutizeng ayaw nu saupu mutizeng ku katuuday. . tizenga tizenga kisu a papelu i nuayawan nu katuuday. . nipatizeng kiya hizaen ku nipatizeng tu tektek? nipatizengan u nipatizengan nu maku a luma' kuyni. . nitizeng matihuway ku nitizeng ni Batu. Batu . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
